alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Koochiching County through 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waskish, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Koochiching County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Minnesota.
